reference.text: walking aids, e.g. sticks, for blind persons A61H3/06
cane or umbrella stands or holders A47G25/12

note.note-paragraph: In this subclass, the following term is used with the meaning indicated: "umbrellas" also covers sunshades similar in construction to umbrellas
In this subclass non-limiting references (in the sense of paragraph 39 of the Guide to the IPC) may still be displayed in the scheme.

reference.text: walking aids, e.g. sticks, for blind persons A61H3/06; walking sticks formed as supports or tripod stands F16M13/08

title-part.text: Sticks with supporting, hanging or carrying means
Walking sticks with rollers for carrying parcels or the like
Walking sticks with means for hanging-up or with locks
Walking sticks or umbrellas convertible into seats
Other sticks, e.g. of cranked shape

CPC-specific-text.text: crank-shaped
Accessories
Shafts
of adjustable length, e.g. telescopic shafts
releasably connected to a wrist strap or a glove

title-part.text: Sticks with name-plates or the like

reference.text: tables with means for holding umbrellas A47B37/04

title-part.text: Umbrellas characterised by their shape or attachment

CPC-specific-text.text: characterised by their shape

title-part.text: attached to the body of the user
mounted on the head of the user

CPC-specific-text.text: with additional rotation about a vertical axis

title-part.text: Special folding or telescoping of umbrellas

CPC-specific-text.text: with elastic ribs
Umbrellas stored inside the stick when closed, e.g. collapsible into the handle
with rigid ribs
without stick
without stretchers
Umbrellas having upward pointing rib ends when closed, i.e. the lower dry side of the cover facing the outside when closed
Umbrellas with stretchers only
Umbrellas without ribs
Portable, self supported sunshades or weather protections
Ground supported umbrellas or sunshades on a single post, e.g. resting in or on a surface there below
with a canopy in form of an inverted cone
Umbrellas or sunshades mounted laterally on a wall or on an apparatus
Cantilever umbrellas or sunshades with a support arm
the support arm being attached to the stick or to the crown, the canopy being suspended there below
the support arm being attached to the stick or to runner, the canopy being suspended there above
the support arm being attached to a rib or being formed by a rib
the support arm being formed by lazy-tongs, one support arm being a rib and the other arm being attached to the runner and to the rib
the support arm being telescopic
the support arm being foldable
the support arm being rotatable about a vertical axis for adjusting the position
the support arm being rotatable about a horizontal axis for adjusting the position
having a planar opening movement wherein the struts or screen sheet rotate and spread around an axis, e.g. around the stick
Sunshades or weather protections of other than umbrella type

reference.text: sticks for umbrellas A45B1/00 - A45B9/00; illuminating devices for umbrellas A45B3/02;

CPC-specific-text.text: sockets or holders for poles or posts E04H12/22
Accessories not covered by groups A45B25/24 - A45B25/30
Automatic closing devices
movable with respect to the shaft

title-part.text: Devices for holding umbrellas closed, e.g. magnetic devices
Devices for opening and for closing umbrellas

CPC-specific-text.text: automatic
with a crank connected to a rope

title-part.text: Automatic openers, e.g. frames with spring mechanisms

CPC-specific-text.text: with fluid or electric actuators
Covers with filtering or screening means for avoiding undesired radiation
Umbrellas with two or more covers

title-part.text: Devices for increasing the resistance of umbrellas to wind
Protective coverings for umbrellas when closed

reference.text: attached to the umbrella stick A45B9/06

title-part.text: Details not otherwise provided for in A45B
with means for generating solar energy
with means for promoting air movement, e.g. ventilation holes, fans, ventilators, special shape for ventilation, suction means
with a misting device having at least one nozzle for spraying a fluid, e.g. water
with containers for storing objects, e.g. box
with other sunshades, awnings or tents
